description:
In order to take over the world, the Keroro Platoon decides to create an anime that will capture the hearts of children everywhere.  But they have no idea how to go about it!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro Shoutai Anime de Pekopon Shinryaku de Arimasu
The Episode We Wanted to Call Tiny Toons or Animaniacs, but Those Were Already Taken!
ケロロ小隊 アニメでペコポン侵略 であります
